**Art Exchange/Contests**
[[collapsible show="+ Art Exchange 2021 for Calibold" hide="- Gamemaster"]]
[[image https://i.imgur.com/x3xaNTl.jpg]]
One of my more odd pieces. Went through a couple of drafts and was during when I switched from SAI to Clip Studio Paint. Enjoyed reading SCP-6900-D
